TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolTaskExtension extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask

Docs.summary: Comprises extended utility methods for constructing a task that wraps a command line tool.

Docs.summary: Fills the specified with the switches and other information that the command line tool must run from the command line and not from a response file.

Docs.param: The name of the parameter to return.
The value to return if `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag%2A>.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the specified Boolean parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `parameterName` does not exist in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension.Bag%2A>, `defaultValue` is returned.

Docs.summary: Returns whether this ToolTask has logged any errors.
